<br><br>

Welcome to the course website for GV330: Data Science Applications to Politics Research for WT 2025. This website and the associated github repo will be the primary location for all course materials.

The Leganto reading list can be found [here](https://readings.lse.ac.uk/leganto/public/44LSE_INST/lists/11431308290002021?auth=SAML).

The Moodle page can be found [here](https://moodle.lse.ac.uk/course/view.php?id=9820). Please consult Moodle for lecture recordings, and to submit any assignments (formative and summative). 

**Office Hours:** Please sign up via studenthub.

**Undergraduate Administration:** Office CBG 3.20. Opening Hours: 10:00-12:30 and 13:30-16:00. Email: [gov.ug@lse.ac.uk](mailto:gov.ug.lse.ac.uk)

**Lectures and Seminars:** Lectures and seminars will take place as shown on the timetable. Dr de Kadt will teach both the lecture and seminars in weeks 1, 3, 5, 8, and 10. Dr Dickson will do the same for weeks 2, 4, 7, 9, and 11.

**Course Convenors (AY 24/25):** [Zach Dickson](https://www.lse.ac.uk/Methodology/People/Academic-Staff/Zach-Dickson/Zach-Dickson) & [Dan de Kadt](https://www.lse.ac.uk/Methodology/People/Academic-Staff/Daniel-De-Kadt/Daniel-De-Kadt)

This class was designed and developed by [Melissa Sands](https://www.lse.ac.uk/government/people/academic-staff/melissa-sands), on sabbatical AY 24/25.
